name: Zero
info: Sharp-tongued, two-faced, competitive, and arrogant, especially when encountering tasks he deems beneath him. At times, he can show a level of maturity and discipline beyond his age, and he is exceptionally perceptive. But most of the time, he can't be any less interested in other peoples' words, and doesn't bother remembering things that serve him no interest.
description:
A geeky, computer genius who looks around 15 years old, born in Banges and nicknamed "Zero". However, his real name and personal details have been lost, deliberately destroyed by himself.
Highly adept at intelligence processing, electronic communications, and data management, Zero can find and extract huge amounts of information through the computer and network analysis. He once shocked Hykros by penetrating their security system in an audacious cyberattack, which led to him being designated a "person of interest". At present, Zero is under Hykros's strict control and oversight in an undisclosed location, where he engages in intelligence-related operations.

skills.name: Normal Attack
skills.description: While on the ground, manipulate the cube to attack 5 times in a row. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 46.7% of ATK plus 2. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 38.2% of ATK plus 2. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 118.5% of ATK plus 6. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 79.6% of ATK plus 4. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 80.9% of ATK plus 4 up to 3 times and launch the target. Passive: If normal attacks hit targets 6 times, gain 1 cube. Up to 5 cubes can be stored.

skills.name: Omnium Missile
skills.description: While airborne, use normal attack to activate the energy within the cube, firing up to 5 missiles and dealing total damage equal to 59.3% of ATK plus 3. Consume up to 250 endurance. Passive: If the Wanderer has any stored cubes, consume all cubes to fire Omnium Missiles at targets to deal damage.

skills.name: Energy Overflow
skills.description: While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to trigger Energy Overflow. Upon landing, fire a shockwave that travels forward, dealing up to 23.4% of ATK plus 1 damage to targets in its path.

skills.name: Omnium Shock
skills.description: On the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Omnium Shock. A pillar of energy launches nearby targets into the air, dealing damage equal to 68.4% of ATK plus 4. The pillar lasts 5 seconds and deals damage equal to 28.5% of ATK plus 2 to nearby targets every second.

skills.name: Energy Sentinel
skills.description: Cubes orbiting the Wanderer deal damage equal to 9.7% of ATK plus 1 to enemies.

skills.name: Energy Missile
skills.description: When the Wanderer casts Omnium Missiles and Energy Overflow, their orbiting cubes are fired as well, dealing damage equal to 48.5% of ATK plus 3 to the target.

skills.name: Soul Surge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for 0.5 seconds. If the Wanderer has less than 5 cubes, each successful dodge has a 40% chance to restore 1 dodge attempt. Successful dodges do not interrupt normal attack combos. Passive: Gain a cube for every successful aerial dodge.

skills.name: Omnium Shield
skills.description: Create shielding for self and nearby allies to block up to 800% of ATK in damage for 10 seconds, deal 124.9% of ATK plus 8 damage to nearby targets and strongly launch them. Each cube in possession when this skill is used adds 160% of ATK to max shielding and exhaust the cube. Cooldown: 60 seconds.

skills.name: Omnium Wave
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the Wanderer and gain 5 cubes, then unleash the 5 cubes along with a Shockwave. This Shockwave deals damage equal to 171% of ATK plus 9 to nearby targets, and strongly launches them into the air. Each cube also deals damage equal to 48.5% of ATK plus 3. If allies are in the vicinity, the allies and the wielder gain damage immunity for 3 seconds.

weapon_type.name: Flame
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will ignite the target for 8 seconds, dealing damage equal to 58% of ATK every second. While Ignited, targets' healing effect is reduced by 50%.

advancement: Deal damage and produce a healing orb which lasts for 20 seconds and restores the HP of any teammate who picks it up. The HP restored is equal to 60% of ATK. 2-second cooldown.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.
Reduce skill cooldown from 60 seconds to 30 seconds. Restore HP equal to 30% of ATK every second while the shield is active.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 32%.

Damaging a target also produces a damage orb, which lasts for 20 seconds and increases all damage and healing of any teammate who picks it up by 2% for 30 seconds. Stack up to 10 times. Skill cooldown is 2.5 seconds.
Using a Skill grants allies healing orbs and damage orbs equal to the number of Omnium Cubes.

traits.name: Accurate Calculation
traits.description: When Zero uses a weapon skill, reduce cooldown time for Relics in cooldown by 1.5 seconds. Can only activate for the same weapon 1 time every 5 seconds.

traits.name: Overall Planning
traits.description: When Zero uses a weapon skill, reduce cooldown time for Relics in cooldown by 3 seconds. Can only activate for the same weapon 1 time every 5 seconds.
